statements: SELECT * FROM compost_pH_levels;
SELECT pile_id, pH_level, measurement_date FROM compost_pH_levels ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE pH_level > 7;
SELECT pile_id, pH_level FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE measurement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(pH_level) AS average_pH FROM compost_pH_levels;
SELECT * FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE pH_level > 7.0 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT pile_id, pH_level, measurement_date FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY pH_level ASC
SELECT AVG(pH_level) AS average_pH, COUNT(*) AS total_measurements FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE measurement_date > '2022-03-15'
SELECT * FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE pH_level < 6.5 AND measurement_date = '2022-05-20'
SELECT pile_id, pH_level, measurement_date FROM compost_pH_levels WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-04-01' AND pH_level BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.0 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC
SELECT * FROM compost_pile;
SELECT id, location FROM compost_pile ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT date_created, pH_level FROM compost_pile WHERE pH_level > 7;
SELECT location FROM compost_pile WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01' AND date_created <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT adjust_id, compost_pile_id, new_pH_level, adjustment_reason FROM pH_adjustment ORDER BY new_pH_level DESC;
SELECT id, location, date_created, pH_level FROM compost_pile WHERE pH_level > 7 ORDER BY date_created DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(pH_level) AS average_pH_level FROM compost_pile;
SELECT location, date_created, new_pH_level FROM compost_pile JOIN pH_adjustment ON compost_pile.id = pH_adjustment.compost_pile_id WHERE new_pH_level < pH_level ORDER BY date_created LIMIT 10;
SELECT compost_pile_id, COUNT(adjust_id) AS adjustment_count FROM pH_adjustment GROUP BY compost_pile_id HAVING COUNT(adjust_id) > 3;
SELECT location, AVG(pH_level) AS avg_pH_level FROM compost_pile WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(pH_level) > 7 ORDER BY avg_pH_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_pile_ph_levels;
SELECT location, temperature FROM compost_piles;
SELECT id, action, description FROM compost_pile_logs;
SELECT pile_id, ph_level, recorded_at FROM compost_pile_ph_levels WHERE ph_level > 5;
SELECT id, location, temperature, moisture_level FROM compost_piles WHERE temperature < 50;
SELECT * FROM compost_pile_ph_levels ORDER BY ph_level DESC, pile_id ASC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM compost_piles WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM compost_pile_logs WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM compost_pile_ph_levels WHERE recorded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT location, temperature FROM compost_piles WHERE temperature >= 60 AND temperature <= 80;
SELECT * FROM compost_piles;
SELECT location, pH_level FROM compost_piles WHERE pH_level > 7;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT compost_pile_id, pH_value, recorded_timestamp FROM pH_readings WHERE pH_value BETWEEN 6.5 AND 7.5;
SELECT adjustment_id, compost_pile_id, action, adjusted_at FROM adjustments ORDER BY adjusted_at;
SELECT * FROM compost_piles ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT location, pH_level FROM compost_piles WHERE pH_level >= 7.0 ORDER BY pH_level ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT compost_pile_id, pH_value, recorded_timestamp FROM pH_readings WHERE recorded_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY recorded_timestamp DESC
SELECT compost_pile_id, COUNT(adjustment_id) AS total_adjustments FROM adjustments GROUP BY compost_pile_id HAVING total_adjustments > 5
SELECT * FROM compost_pile1 ORDER BY pH_level DESC;
SELECT pile_id, pH_level FROM compost_pile2 WHERE pH_level > 7.0;
SELECT * FROM compost_pile3 WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT pile_id, date FROM compost_pile4 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT AVG(pH_level) AS average_pH FROM compost_pile5;
SELECT * FROM compost_pile1 WHERE pH_level < 7 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pile_id, date FROM compost_pile2 WHERE pH_level > 7;
SELECT MAX(pH_level) AS max_pH_level FROM compost_pile3;
SELECT pile_id, date, pH_level FROM compost_pile4 WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT AVG(pH_level) AS avg_pH_level FROM compost_pile5 WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
